I am an energetic and enthusiastic person who enjoys a challenge
and achieving personal goals. My present career aim is to work
within IT. For me is very importnat to find a work that is
interesting and satisfying. The opportunity to learn new skills and
work with new technologies is particularly attractive to me.
I am a person who loves working in a team, because communication
with people is something that makes me happier.
In my free time i like to hang out with friends and meet new people.
When i want to relax i am reading books, watching movies
or serials and of course listening good music.
More information about me and my skills you can found in my CV.
